embeds.title: Summon Altar Information

fields.name: How It Works
fields.value:
Use Magic Books in the Summon Altar to summon monsters and use summoning spells to level up the monster. There are currently 8 summons available.

When you obtain enough magic books to summon a stronger monster, use the DISMANTLE option to take back your summoning spells and use them on the new monster. **You will not lose any resources doing this.**

Magic Books and Summoning Spell: Available for purchase. Can also be found in Dimensional Tunnel and as a reward for certain events.

Marching Skin: The deployed marching skin has no impact on your power and can differ from the deployed monster in Summon Altar. Go to the Skins tab to change the troop skin.

fields.name: Embassy Recommendation
fields.value: Do not purchase summons at full price. The price drops significantly over time and they will also be released as rewards and in the Dimensional Tunnel.
